title: No KRID 820-2850 where's the ME?
message:
Hi.

Trying to clean an ME on a 2850 board. Can't find KRID. What to search for? ... Is it the same overwrite proceedure as sandy+ CPUs?

title: No KRID 820-2850 where's the ME?
message: 2850 has "ignition" version of ME. So you need to find a clean "ignition" version, I believe only 150KB. I bet it is quicker to swap a PCH+BIOS from a donor board.
